definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: It could aggravate the symptoms by amplifying the very inflammatory agents that cause them.
sentences.chinese: 這會增加引發這些症狀的炎性因子進而加劇症狀。

sentences.english: Seen here in a portal tract is an intense chronic inflammatory infiltrate with loss of bile ductules.
sentences.chinese: 圖中的門管區具有突出的慢性炎性浸潤而膽小管喪失。

sentences.english: We report an unusual case of inflammatory fibroid polyp presenting with chronic anemia.
sentences.chinese: 我們報告一個以貧血爲表現的炎性纖維息肉的病例。

sentences.english: Endogenous pro-inflammatory cytokine was contributed to the BRB breakdown.
sentences.chinese: 內源性的炎性因子是血一眼屏障破壞的根源。

sentences.english: Parenchymatous organs appeared degeneration and infiltration with the inflammatory cells.
sentences.chinese: 實質器官普遍發生變性和炎性細胞浸潤。

sentences.english: Objective To summarize the experience in diagnosis and treatment of liver inflammatory pseudoneoplasm.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結分析18例肝臟炎性假瘤臨牀診治情況。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze and explore MRI show of inflammatory artificial tumor of eye socket .
sentences.chinese: 目的分析和探討眼眶炎性假瘤的MRI表現。

sentences.english: Alveolus cavity enlarge with some alveolus atrophy under light microscope.
sentences.chinese: 光鏡下肺泡腔炎性細胞浸潤明顯減輕。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinicopathological features of liver inflammatory pseudotumor (LIP).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討肝臟炎性假瘤的臨牀病理要點。

sentences.english: A type of acne characterized by the presence of papules and pustules.
sentences.chinese: 是一種炎性的青春痘類型，表現爲丘疹或膿皰。

sentences.english: Methods Clinical data of 9 cases of early postoperative inflammatory small bowel obstruction was analyzed retrospectively.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顧性分析近期經治的術後早期炎性腸梗阻9例。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effects of stilamin on early postoperative inflammatory small bowel obstruction.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討施他寧在術後早期炎性腸梗阻中的治療作用。

sentences.english: An inflammatory exudate collects on the surface .
sentences.chinese: 炎性滲出物集合在表面。

sentences.english: Seen here in a portal tract is an intee chronic inflammatory infiltrate with lo of bile ductules.
sentences.chinese: 圖中的門管區具有突出的慢性炎性浸潤而膽小管喪失。

sentences.english: Conclusion The early postoperative inflammatory in small bowel obstruction should be subjected to conservative treatment.
sentences.chinese: 結論術後早期炎性腸梗阻應仍以保守治療爲主。

sentences.english: The symptom of inflammatory obstruction were disappeared, and no complications occurred during follow-up.
sentences.chinese: 炎性梗阻症狀消失，院外隨訪未見不適。
